Did you know you can get up to 4x your voucher value when you spend your vouchers with our Boost Partners? To find out more
please click here.
Clubcard Boost at Tesco has now ended.
Please ensure your Clubcard Boost tokens have printed clearly on white paper, before taking into store. Unfortunately, smudged or unclear barcodes are unable to be scanned at the till.

Clubcard Boost tokens will be accepted printed in black & white or in colour. If you are worried your printout might not be clear enough, try printing it out again, (Clubcard Boost tokens can be printed more than once), or write down the 22 digit barcode number that is next to the barcode and take this into store with your printed Clubcard Boost tokens. If your barcode does not scan, checkout staff can type in the barcode number at the till to redeem your Clubcard Boost tokens.
Please note: Clubcard Boost tokens will display their original expiry date.
Select tokens
These are the Boost tokens you ordered to spend in store (but not at Tesco Direct desks). See your email to check where you can spend them if you are not sure.
Follow the instructions below to print your Clubcard Boost tokens to spend in store.
Any Clubcard Boost tokens ordered in store will not be listed below.
Please note: Clubcard Boost tokens can only be used once.
My Boosts at Tesco

Please note:

With Clubcard Boost your vouchers can be worth double when you spend them at Tesco in selected departments, either in store or online. Here’s the place to see what’s going on with Boost tokens you bought online.
Please allow one hour for your order to be processed. Remember, you won’t be able to view expired Boost tokens or Boost tokens purchased in store.
Good news! Clubcard Boost at Tesco is now on.
Want to know more about what your vouchers could be worth? Read more about Clubcard Boost
If you exchange your vouchers on the Clubcard website for Boost eCodes at Tesco, your eCodes will be displayed on this page.
